TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextBox extends System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase

summary.span: 表示 Windows 文本框控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows text box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与控件，用户可以在应用程序中输入文本。With the control, the user can enter text in an application. 此控件具有标准 Windows 文本框控件，包括多行编辑和密码字符屏蔽中找不到的其他功能。This control has additional functionality that is not found in the standard Windows text box control, including multiline editing and password character masking. 通常情况下，控件用于显示，或者接受作为输入，单个文本行。Typically, a control is used to display, or accept as input, a single line of text. 你可以使用和属性，以启用要输入或显示的文本的多个行。You can use the and properties to enable multiple lines of text to be displayed or entered. 设置和属性设置为`true`以启用更高版本中为多行的文本操作控件。Set the and properties to `true` to enable greater text manipulation in a multiline control. > [!NOTE] > 必须设置属性`true`调整高度控件。You must set the property to `true` to adjust the height of the control. 你可以通过设置调整高度属性。You can adjust the height by setting the property. 你可以限制的文本输入到量通过设置到特定数量的字符的属性。You can limit the amount of text entered into a control by setting the property to a specific number of characters. 控件还可以用来接受密码和其他敏感信息。 controls can also be used to accept passwords and other sensitive information. 你可以使用属性设置为单线条版本的控件中输入掩码字符。You can use the property to mask characters entered in a single-line version of the control. 使用属性，使用户能够仅键入大写形式，并仅大小写或到大写和小写字符的组合控件。Use the property to enable the user to type only uppercase, only lowercase, or a combination of uppercase and lowercase characters into the control. 窗口的内容滚动之前光标 （脱字号） 控件的可见区域内，你可以使用方法。To scroll the contents of the until the cursor (caret) is within the visible region of the control, you can use the method. 若要在文本框中选择一个文本范围，可以使用方法。To select a range of text in the text box, you can use the method. 若要从输入中限制文本控件，你可以创建的事件处理程序若要验证输入控件中的每个字符的事件。To restrict text from being entered in a control, you can create an event handler for the event in order to validate each character entered in the control. 你也可以限制中的数据的所有条目通过设置属性`true`。You can also restrict all entry of data in a control by setting the property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 大多数功能的控件继承自类。Most of the functionality of the control is inherited from the class. > > 使用启用了视觉样式的控件将导致代理项字体的不正确处理。Using the control with visual styles enabled will cause the incorrect handling of surrogate fonts. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建多行带垂直滚动条的控件。The following code example creates a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此示例使用， ，和属性，以使多行文本框控件可用于创建文本文档。This example uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 父容器控件定义的颜色和字体设置。The parent container control defines the color and font settings for the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的新实例控制并将字符串分配给控件的属性。The following code example creates a new instance of the control and assigns a string to the control's property. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBox.TextBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.TextBox Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox.TextBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.TextBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox.TextBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.TextBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AcceptsReturn { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在多行 控件中按 Enter 键时，是在控件中创建一行新文本还是激活窗体的默认按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing ENTER in a multiline control creates a new line of text in the control or activates the default button for the form.

value.span: 如果按 Enter 键时在多行版本的控件中创建一行新文本，则为 ；如果按 Enter 键时激活窗体的默认按钮，则为 。

span.span: if the ENTER key creates a new line of text in a multiline version of the control; if the ENTER key activates the default button for the form.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性的值是`false`，用户必须按 CTRL + ENTER 以在多行中创建一个新行控件。If the value of this property is `false`, the user must press CTRL+ENTER to create a new line in a multiline control. 如果没有窗体的默认按钮，ENTER 键将总是在控件中，而不考虑此属性的值创建新的一行文本。If there is no default button for the form, the ENTER key will always create a new line of text in the control, regardless of the value of this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建多行带垂直滚动条的控件。The following code example creates a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此示例使用， ，和属性，以使多行文本框控件可用于创建文本文档。This example uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::AutoCompleteStringCollection ^ AutoCompleteCustomSource { System::Windows::Forms::AutoCompleteStringCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::AutoCompleteStringCollection ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个自定义 ，以便在 属性被设置为 时使用。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom to use when the property is set to .

value.span: 一个与 一起使用的 。

span.span: A to use with .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用， ，和属性以创建，通过比较输入于维护的源中的所有字符串的前缀的前缀来自动完成输入的字符串。Use the , , and properties to create a that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source. 这可用于在其中 Url、 地址、 文件名称或命令将经常输入的控件。This is useful for controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered. 使用属性是可选的但您必须设置属性`CustomSource`才能使用。The use of the property is optional, but you must set the property to `CustomSource` in order to use . 必须使用和属性组合在一起。You must use the and properties together. > [!NOTE] > 操作系统可能会限制可以同时显示的自定义字符串的数量。The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将集合的自动完成自定义源用作控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a collection as the auto-complete custom source for a control. 此示例将执行下列操作：This example does the following: - 使用属性来启用控件能够接受其自动完成行为的自定义源。Uses the property to enable the control to accept a custom source for its auto-complete behavior. - 使用属性设置的值的自定义列表。Uses the property to set the custom list of values. - 使用属性来设置自动完成候选项的显示方式。Uses the property to set how the auto-complete candidates are displayed. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.textbox.autocompletecustomsource/cs/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.textbox.autocompletecustomsource/vb/form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::AutoCompleteMode AutoCompleteMode { System::Windows::Forms::AutoCompleteMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::AutoCompleteMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个选项，该选项控制自动完成应用于 的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets an option that controls how automatic completion works for the .
One of the values of .
The following are the values.

value.span: 将最可能的候选字符串的其余部分追加到现有的字符，并突出显示追加的字符。

span.span: Appends the remainder of the most likely candidate string to the existing characters, highlighting the appended characters.

value.span: 显示与编辑控件关联的辅助下拉列表。

span.span: Displays the auxiliary drop-down list associated with the edit control.

value.span: 此下拉列表填充了一个或多个建议完成字符串。

span.span: This drop-down is populated with one or more suggested completion strings.
Appends both and options.
Disables automatic completion.
This is the default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用， ，和属性以创建，通过比较输入于维护的源中的所有字符串的前缀的前缀来自动完成输入的字符串。Use the , , and properties to create a that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source. 这可用于在其中 Url、 地址、 文件名称或命令将经常输入的控件。This is useful for controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered. 使用属性是可选的但您必须设置属性`CustomSource`才能使用。The use of the property is optional, but you must set the property to `CustomSource` in order to use . 必须使用和属性组合在一起。You must use the and properties together. > [!NOTE] > 操作系统可能会限制可以同时显示的自定义字符串的数量。The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将集合的自动完成自定义源用作控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a collection as the auto-complete custom source for a control. 此示例将执行下列操作：This example does the following: - 使用属性来启用控件能够接受其自动完成行为的自定义源。Uses the property to enable the control to accept a custom source for its auto-complete behavior. - 使用属性设置的值的自定义列表。Uses the property to set the custom list of values. - 使用属性来设置自动完成候选项的显示方式。Uses the property to set how the auto-complete candidates are displayed. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.textbox.autocompletecustomsource/cs/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.textbox.autocompletecustomsource/vb/form1.vb#10)]

exception.span: 指定的值不是 值之一。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用， ，和属性以创建，通过比较输入于维护的源中的所有字符串的前缀的前缀来自动完成输入的字符串。Use the , , and properties to create a that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source. 这可用于在其中 Url、 地址、 文件名称或命令将经常输入的控件。This is useful for controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered. 使用属性是可选的但您必须设置属性`CustomSource`才能使用。The use of the property is optional, but you must set the property to `CustomSource` in order to use . 必须使用和属性组合在一起。You must use the and properties together. > [!NOTE] > 不能在多行控件。 does not work on multiline controls. > [!NOTE] > 操作系统可能会限制可以在一次显示的自定义字符串的数量。The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that can be displayed at once. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将集合的自动完成自定义源用作控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a collection as the auto-complete custom source for a control. 此示例将执行下列操作：This example does the following: - 使用属性来启用控件能够接受其自动完成行为的自定义源。Uses the property to enable the control to accept a custom source for its auto-complete behavior. - 使用属性设置的值的自定义列表。Uses the property to set the custom list of values. - 使用属性来设置自动完成候选项的显示方式。Uses the property to set how the auto-complete candidates are displayed. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::CharacterCasing CharacterCasing { System::Windows::Forms::CharacterCasing get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::CharacterCasing value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件是否在字符键入时修改其大小写格式。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the control modifies the case of characters as they are typed.

value.span: 枚举值中的一个值，它指定 控件是否修改字符的大小写格式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the control modifies the case of characters.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性可以更改为按你的应用程序所需的字符的大小写。You can use the property to change the case of characters as required by your application. 例如，您无法更改输入中的所有字符的大小写控件，用于输入密码用于大写或小写，以强制实施密码策略。For example, you could change the case of all characters entered in a control used for password entry to uppercase or lowercase to enforce a policy for passwords. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建用于接受密码的控件。The following code example creates a control that is used to accept a password. 此示例使用属性以更改到类型化的所有字符小写，与属性将密码长度限制为八个字符。This example uses the property to change all characters typed to lowercase, and the property to restrict the password length to eight characters. 此示例还使用属性到中心中的密码控件。This example also uses the property to center the password in the control. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 分配给该属性的值不在该枚举的有效值范围内。

span.span: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写，请注意不要引用在以前调用之前释放对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能在多行控件。 does not work on multiline controls. 字体更改时，不显示任何已定义的缩进。When the font is changed, any indentation that you have defined does not appear. 若要获取缩进，设置到`true`并重写而不会调用基类，以便不调用 SETMARGINS WM_SETFONT。To get indentation, set to `true` and override WM_SETFONT without calling the base class so that SETMARGINS is not called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建多行带垂直滚动条的控件。The following code example creates a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此示例使用， ，和属性，以使多行文本框控件可用于创建文本文档。This example uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnBackColorChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnBackColorChanged (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户选择中的文本控件，控件将保存所选内容。When the user selects text in a control, the control saves the selection. 当控件获得焦点时，所选内容等同于时失去焦点。When a control gets focus, the selection is the same as when the loses focus. 当获得焦点时第一次，选定的整个文本。When the gets focus for the first time, the entire text is selected. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property char PasswordChar { char get(); void set(char value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置字符，该字符用于屏蔽单行 控件中的密码字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the character used to mask characters of a password in a single-line control.

value.span: 用于屏蔽在单行 控件中输入的字符的字符。

span.span: The character used to mask characters entered in a single-line control.

value.span: 如果不想让控件在字符键入时将它们屏蔽，请将此属性值设置为 0（字符值）。

span.span: Set the value of this property to 0 (character value) if you do not want the control to mask characters as they are typed.
Equals 0 (character value) by default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的优先级高于属性。The property has precedence over the property. 每当设置为`true`、 使用默认系统的密码字符和任何字符集将被忽略。Whenever the is set to `true`, the default system password character is used and any character set by is ignored. 当属性设置，则无法执行使用键盘控件中的剪切和复制操作。When the property is set, cut and copy actions in the control using the keyboard cannot be performed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当处于密码模式，因为， ，或是`true`、处于受限模式。When the is in password mode because , , or is `true`, the is in restricted mode. 在此模式下，被禁用，但是当前进行缓存以便它可以还原如果变为不受限制。In this mode, the is disabled, but the current is cached so that it can be restored if the ever becomes unrestricted. 切换是一个常用方案。Toggling the is a common scenario. 控件处于受限模式中被隐藏。The is shadowed while the control is in restricted mode. 从设计器的角度看，显示值是实际值。From the designer perspective, the value shown is the actual value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建用于接受密码的控件。The following code example creates a control that is used to accept a password. 此示例使用属性以更改所有字符类型化为小写和属性将密码长度限制为八个字符。This example uses the property to change all characters typed to lowercase and the property to restrict the password length to eight characters. 此示例还使用属性到中心中的密码控件。This example also uses the property to center the password in the control. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The text to replace.

summary.span: 将选定文本设置为指定文本，但不清除撤消缓冲区。

span.span: Sets the selected text to the specified text without clearing the undo buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与设置不同，不会影响剪贴板。Unlike setting , does not affect the Clipboard.

summary.span: 处理命令键。

span.span: Processes a command key.

returns.span: 如果命令键已由控件处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the command key was processed by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 4.6.1 中的新增功能。New in 4.6.1. 在以前版本中的 Ctrl A 快捷键无法选择所有文本时和属性均设置为`true.`。In previous versions, the Ctrl-A shortcut key in a failed to select all text when the and properties were both set to `true.`. 此方法使 Ctrl A 快捷键以选择所有文本时和属性都设置为 `true.`This method enables the Ctrl-A shortcut key to select all text when the and properties are both set to `true.` 面向.NET Framework 版本 4.0 到 4.6 应用程序可以充分利用此方法，通过添加以下``app.config 文件的部分：Applications targeting .NET Framework versions 4.0 through 4.6 can take advantage of this method by adding the following to the `` section of the app.config file: ```xml ``` 面向.NET framework 4.6.1 或更高版本可以应用程序选择退出此行为将添加到以下``app.config 文件的部分：Applications targeting .NET Framework versions 4.6.1 or newer can opt out of this behavior by adding the following to the `` section of the app.config file: ```xml ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果 app.config 文件已包含`AppContextSwitchOverrides`密钥，将新的密钥值合并到现有的密钥。If the app.config file already contains an `AppContextSwitchOverrides` key, merge the new key value into the existing key. 例如 ``。For example, ``.

permission.span: 用于操作与非托管代码。

span.span: for operating with unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::ScrollBars ScrollBars { System::Windows::Forms::ScrollBars get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::ScrollBars value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置哪些滚动条应出现在多行 控件中。

span.span: Gets or sets which scroll bars should appear in a multiline control.

value.span: 枚举值之一，它指示多行 控件显示时是不带滚动条、带有水平滚动条、带有垂直滚动条还是同时带有这两种滚动条。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether a multiline control appears with no scroll bars, a horizontal scroll bar, a vertical scroll bar, or both.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会显示水平滚动条如果属性设置为`true`，而不考虑的值的属性。Horizontal scroll bars will not be shown if the property is set to `true`, regardless of the value of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建多行带垂直滚动条的控件。The following code example creates a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此示例还使用， ，和属性以使多行控件可用于创建文本文档。This example also uses the , , and properties to make the multiline control useful for creating text documents. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBox.ScrollBars Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.ScrollBars Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox.ScrollBars Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.ScrollBars Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox.ScrollBars Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.ScrollBars Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.

span.span: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
The text associated with this control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::HorizontalAlignment TextAlign { System::Windows::Forms::HorizontalAlignment get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::HorizontalAlignment value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中文本的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets how text is aligned in a control.

value.span: 枚举值之一，指定控件中文本的对齐方式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies how text is aligned in the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此属性中对齐文本以匹配窗体上的文本的布局。You can use this property to align the text within a to match the layout of text on your form. 例如，如果你的控件位于窗体右侧上，你可以设置属性`HorizontalAlignment.Right`，并且将与控件而不是默认左对齐方式的右侧对齐文本。For example, if your controls are all located on the right side of the form, you can set the property to `HorizontalAlignment.Right`, and the text will be aligned with the right side of the control instead of the default left alignment. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建用于接受密码的控件。The following code example creates a control that is used to accept a password. 此示例使用属性以更改到类型化的所有字符小写，与属性将密码长度限制为八个字符。This example uses the property to change all characters typed to lowercase, and the property to restrict the password length to eight characters. 此示例还使用属性到中心中的密码控件。This example also uses the property to center the password in the control. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 分配给该属性的值不在该枚举的有效值范围内。

span.span: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event TextAlignChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 在 属性的值更改后发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表有助于您了解发生的事件，并可以帮助您进行调试时。This report helps you find out when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`TextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TextBox1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#249](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#249)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#249](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#249)]

value.span: 如果 控件中的文本应该以默认的密码字符显示，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the text in the control should appear as the default password character; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的优先级高于属性。The property has precedence over the property. 每当设置为`true`、 使用默认系统的密码字符和任何字符集将被忽略。Whenever the is set to `true`, the default system password character is used and any character set by is ignored. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当处于密码模式，因为， ，或是`true`、处于受限模式。When the is in password mode because , , or is `true`, the is in restricted mode. 在此模式下，被禁用，但是当前进行缓存以便它可以还原如果变为不受限制。In this mode, the is disabled, but the current is cached so that it can be restored if the ever becomes unrestricted. 切换是一个常用方案。Toggling the is a common scenario. 控件处于受限模式中被隐藏。The is shadowed while the control is in restricted mode. 从设计器的角度看，显示值是实际值。From the designer perspective, the value shown is the actual value.
